Dialog.text: Hi Daddy. Happy birthday! I made you a present, but... you'll have to open it when you get home because your company has lame rules.
Guess what? I finally trotted with Leda! It was awesome.
Uhm... what else... Oh--Ren peed in one of your cowboy boots. Sorry.
I really miss you. Tell Mr. Yu I said kids should be allowed in space.
Well... I guess that's all for now. I love you. (Kiss)
